Key Match Events: Canada shocked Ireland by 12 runs to record their first-ever win in T20 World Cup
Nicolas Kirton was the Player of the Match for his attacking and momentum shifting knock 49 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Saad Bin Zafar, the captain of Canada said that it's a proud moment for his team
Paul Stirling, Ireland's skipper said that it is a tough loss and they were slow to begin with
Others: The match was played at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York

The under-fire pitch at Nassau County played much better but Canada couldn't capitalise until Barbadian-born Nicholas Kirton threw caution to the wind and lifted his team to a fighting 137 for seven in their T20 World Cup match
